title: Tesla Inc. stock falls Friday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of Tesla Inc. 
        TSLA,
        -2.25%
       slipped 1.15% to $170.83 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        -0.12%
       rising 0.16% to 16,428.82 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.77% to 39,475.90. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Tesla Inc. closed $128.46 below its 52-week high ($299.29), which the company achieved on July 19th. Trading volume (74.9 M) remained 29.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 104.8 M.
